alert.note: Alert for Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:59PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wibaux County through 800 PM MDT... At 658 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Golva, or 10 miles southwest of Beach, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wibaux, Carlyle, Saint Phillip and Yates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
